description:
A lightweight travel pack for frequent flyers and globetrotters. An integrated daypack zips off the front for hands-free exploring or trips to the local market. The Farpoint 55 meets most carry-on restrictions when the daypack is removed. Comfortable shoulder straps and hipbelt make it easy to shoulder your load, and they zip away behind a panel in case you're forced to gate-check. The main compartment opens like a suitcase for easy packing and unpacking.

  • Made of durable 450-denier recycled polyester to withstand the demands of travel
  • Foam AirScape® backpanel with LightWire frame transfers the load evenly while maintaining airflow to your back
  • Adjustable torso length and sternum strap accommodates a wide range of users
  • Stowaway harness and hipbelt zip behind a panel for protection when you check your bag
  • Large U-shaped zippered opening provides easy access to the main compartment
  • Lockable zippers on the main compartment for worry free transport
  • Interior mesh pockets and compression straps keep your stuff organized
  • Lower zippered compartment with divider and external zippered toiletry pocket
  • Removable straps let you carry a sleeping pad, yoga mat or jacket on the bottom
  • Stretch mesh hip belt pocket
  • External gear attachment points and compression straps
  • Padded top and side handles provide comfortable carry options in suitcase mode
  • Includes the Farpoint/Fairview 15L Daypack that features a sleeve for a laptop or hydration bladder with a lockable main compartment
name: Osprey Farpoint 55 Travel Pack - Men's
